an Irish team game similar to hockey, played with a ball and a stick with a wide, oval end, and 15 players on each team: Ireland's national sports are Gaelic football and hurling. Hurling players can catch and carry the ball with their hand but can only pass with a hurley, foot or a slap of the hand. See also
camogie
More examplesFewer examplesHurling's a tough game but I don't think anyone was badly injured because of dirty tackles. Tipperary is the self-styled "home of hurling".Waterford and Kilkenny are used to battering each other on the hurling pitch.
